actiemail:
Your account has been created.
An activation email has been sent to the email address you entered.
actierror: Your account could not be activated. Please contact the administrator about this problem.
actifinish: Your account has been successfully activated.
pwres: A password reset email has been sent to the email address you entered.
pwreas:
The password reset email has already been sent to your email.
Please check your inbox again or contact the administrator about this.
pwrerr: Your password could not be reset. Please contact the administrator about this problem.
signinerr:
You could not be signed in. Double check your credentials and try again.
If the problem persists, please contact the administrator.
signuperr: Your registration could not be processed. Please contact the administrator about this problem.
